page.title: 19MARAZION MALE VOICE CHOIR
page.content:
The Marazion "Apollo" Male Choir is one of the best known of many Cornish choirs. It was formed over 80 years ago and has about sixty members including an accompanist and conductor.
The choir gives concerts locally and enters many musical festival competitions throughout the British Isles. It has also travelled abroad and given performances in other countries.
It has had many successes over the years and become known nationally through recordings of its work, and its performances on radio and television.
